title: Send Preventive Care Reminder
description: A medical assistant uses a population health tool to send reminders to all female patients over 50 who are due for a mammogram.

tasks.description: Run a report to identify all active female patients aged 50+ who have not had a mammogram in the last year.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a list of patients who are due for screening.

tasks.description: Select a pre-written mammogram reminder message template.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent chooses the appropriate communication template.

tasks.description: Send the reminder to the list of patients via their preferred communication method (e.g., email, text message).
tasks.expected_outcome: The outreach campaign is successfully launched to improve screening rates.
